## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G31430](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G31430)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PMEI5</u>
- **Gene Name:** pectin methylesterase inhibitor 5
- **Description:**   Plant invertase/pectin methylesterase inhibitor superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)

- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
